actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Cohen under the authority of the order of May 13, 81 favorably with amendments. With written report No. 97-107.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 135.
Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

actions.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended).
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.  Report No: 97-341.
Placed on Union Calendar No: 210.
Placed on Consent Calendar No: 24.
Called up by House on Call of Consent Calendar.
Passed House (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Senate agreed to the House amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 97-344.

official_title: A bill to provide for the partitioning of certain restricted Indian land in the State of Kansas.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Provides for the partitioning of three specified areas of restricted Indian land in Kansas. Sets forth procedures by which moneys resulting from the sale of such land shall be distributed and administered.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the partitioning of certain restricted Indian land in the State of Kansas.
